channel.title: Javac Batch file
channel.description:
I know it said to not ask but serisouly i can not understand that one in the sticky some1 help me please and thanks
Help me please and thanks it says javac is not reconized as an internal or external command javac batch file
it says something like that my compile runs fine but when i hit runserver that pops up.... ive followed mod thoraks guide 3 times i did it over 3 times and it still doesnt work please help thanks
Help me on here or email me at worldof1992@aim.com
[br][size=1]Posted on: February 18, 2007, 09:15:35 PM[/size][hr]Help would be the best thanks
I use mod thoraks perfect comiler its just that... at my friends i made a server and when i log in i use the ip 0.0.0.0 and it lets me log on perfectly and when im at my house it doesnt work i have to use 127.0.0.1 but when i use that no1 else can log onto it ne ideas??
